_assessmentId.title: Assessment Name
_assessmentId.description: The unique name of the assessment for which the graphic should be displayed. If you only have one assessment, you can leave this blank.

_isVisibleBeforeCompletion.title: Show before assessment completion
_isVisibleBeforeCompletion.description: Controls whether this component will be visible or hidden prior to the assessment having been completed

_assessmentIncomplete.title: Incomplete Graphic
_assessmentIncomplete.description: The graphic to display before the user has completed the assessment. Only applicable if the user can view this component before assessment completion (e.g. if Trickle is disabled).

alt.title: Alternative Text
alt.description: A description of the image. Required when the image has meaning that must be conveyed to the learner. For 'decorative' images, leave this blank.

_assessmentPassed.title: Passed Graphic
_assessmentPassed.description: The graphic to display if the user passes the assessment

alt.title: Alternative Text
alt.description: A description of the image. Required when the image has meaning that must be conveyed to the learner. For 'decorative' images, leave this blank.

_assessmentFailed.title: Failed Graphic
_assessmentFailed.description: The graphic to display if the user fails the assessment

alt.title: Alternative Text
alt.description: A description of the image. Required when the image has meaning that must be conveyed to the learner. For 'decorative' images, leave this blank.
